title: Power Apps Date Time Math - Do calculations for payroll and timesheets
excerpt: Learn to use some of my favorite functions, like Mod and With, to do math with your date and times. Includes calculating Weeks and Days between dates, finding the start of the week, is it a weekday, and even rounding up or down to the nearest quarter hour.
